comment:
Extracted Variables:
1. x: Number of acres of apples to grow.
2. y: Number of acres of pears to grow.

Definitions:
- x >= 5 (Minimum required acres of apples)
- y >= 10 (Minimum required acres of pears)
- x + y <= 50 (Total available land in acres)
- y <= 2x (Limitation on growing pears compared to apples)

Objective:
Maximize the profit: Maximize 2x + 4y.
